file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 73-11-10-07 - FUEL NOZZLES - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FUEL NOZZLES - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the fuel nozzles. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 73-11-10-100-801-A ♦ FUEL NOZZLES - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 73-11-10 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 73-11-10-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FUEL NOZZLES - CLEANING A. General (1) To clean the fuel nozzles, obey the instructions given in Rolls-Royce CMM CSP 34023 and MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce CMM CSP 34023 73-12-12 - Rolls-Royce CMM CSP 34023 73-12-15 - Rolls-Royce IPC CSP 33002 73-11-10 - Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 Task 73-11-10-000-801 - Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 Task 73-11-10-400-801 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine Lower Cowling 423 RH Engine Lower Cowling 412 LH Engine Upper Cowling 422 RH Engine Upper Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 73-11-10 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • START 1/2. (2) Remove the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the fuel nozzles. (3) Remove the fuel nozzles. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 Task 73-11-10-000-801. J. Clean Fuel Nozzles SUBTASK 130-002-A (1) Clean the fuel nozzles. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce CMM CSP 34023 73-12-12 or Rolls-Royce CMM CSP 34023 73-12-15. NOTE: Refer to Rolls-Royce IPC CSP 33002 73-11-10 for configuration. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the fuel nozzles. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 Task 73-11-10-400-801. (2) Install the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from them: • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 73-11-10 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
